thread.section_title: Elevate Styles Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Elevate Styles | elevatestyles.com | 2 of 165
thread.title: Melody

author: Melody
title: Melody
text:
It was my first time ever buying a hair wig. I have suffered from hair loss due to the prescribed medication in 2015 and had to shave my hair off. Feelings of seeing your hair fall off is gut retching. Elevate Style provided me with good customer service and very fast delivery. I can go out without having to feel embarrassed.
I appreciate the experience from the service that was provided. I can say Man! I feel like a woman.
Song by Shania Twain.
